Posts.Content: Nov 27, 2011 05:08AM Lynn7 wrote: Hi Everyone! I'm new. I was reading your posts. It helps to know others are going through this. I'm scheduled for Dec. 12 for a BMX. Apparently, I'm unique in that I have the cancer in both breasts! Im waiting for the results on the genetic testing.If there is a December club, please tell me how to join. I not getting the reconstruction, I'm too scared. I'm really trying to stay positive. Praying a lot.
Posts.Title: My BMX Has Been Rescheduled for December 5th Blessings2011 rachelvk
